text:
The staff of various banks under the banner Namakkal District Bank Employees Association staged a demonstration in front of the State Bank of Hyderabad branch on Thursday in support of the nationwide strike called by the All India Bank Employees’ Association (AIBEA) on Friday.

The Friday strike is to protest against the “unfair” policies adopted by the State Bank of India with respect to its five associate banks. The AIBEA has demanded delinking the associate banks from State Bank of India.
title: Demonstration staged
